languages.text: {n}Маражай негромко смеется, закинув голову.{/n} "Значит, в тебе есть крупица той одержимости, что правит мной, и мне удалось раздуть ее в огонь. Хорошо. Очень хорошо".
{n}Marazhai laughs softly, tilting his head.{/n} "So you also nurture a spark of the obsession that rules me, and I managed to fan it into a blaze. Good. Very good."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай негромко смеется, закинув голову.{/n} "Значит, в тебе есть крупица той одержимости, что правит мной, и мне удалось раздуть ее в огонь. Хорошо. Очень хорошо".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laughs softly, tilting his head.{/n} "So you also nurture a spark of the obsession that rules me, and I managed to fan it into a blaze. Good. Very good."
{n}Marazhai laughs softly, tilting his head.{/n} "So you also nurture a spark of the obsession that rules me, and I managed to fan it into a blaze. Good. Very good."
{n}Marazhai laughs softly, tilting his head.{/n} "So you also nurture a spark of the obsession that rules me, and I managed to fan it into a blaze. Good. Very good."
{n}Marazhai laughs softly, tilting his head.{/n} "So you also nurture a spark of the obsession that rules me, and I managed to fan it into a blaze. Good. Very good."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋歪着脑袋，柔声笑了起来。{/n}“也就是说，你心中本就燃烧着和我一样的欲望，渴望支配他人。我只是加了把火，让它烧得更旺了。很好。好极了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs softly, tilting his head.{/n} "So you also nurture a spark of the obsession that rules me, and I managed to fan it into a blaze. Good. Very good."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋歪着脑袋，柔声笑了起来。{/n}“也就是说，你心中本就燃烧着和我一样的欲望，渴望支配他人。我只是加了把火，让它烧得更旺了。很好。好极了。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ríe entre dientes y ladea la cabeza.{/n} «De modo que también tú albergas una chispa de la obsesión que me domina, y que yo he logrado avivar hasta convertirla en una llama. Bien. Muy bien».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs softly, tilting his head.{/n} "So you also nurture a spark of the obsession that rules me, and I managed to fan it into a blaze. Good. Very good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai ríe entre dientes y ladea la cabeza.{/n} «De modo que también tú albergas una chispa de la obsesión que me domina, y que yo he logrado avivar hasta convertirla en una llama. Bien. Muy bien».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un petit rire et incline légèrement la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Vous possédiez donc une étincelle d'obsession semblable à celle qui me guide, et j'ai réussi à l'attiser pour en faire un brasier. Bien. Je suis satisfait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs softly, tilting his head.{/n} "So you also nurture a spark of the obsession that rules me, and I managed to fan it into a blaze. Good. Very good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un petit rire et incline légèrement la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Vous possédiez donc une étincelle d'obsession semblable à celle qui me guide, et j'ai réussi à l'attiser pour en faire un brasier. Bien. Je suis satisfait. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht leicht und hält den Kopf schief.{/n} "Ihr nährt also auch einen Funken meiner Besessenheit und ich habe es geschafft, ihn zu einer Flamme zu entfachen. Gut. Sehr gut."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs softly, tilting his head.{/n} "So you also nurture a spark of the obsession that rules me, and I managed to fan it into a blaze. Good. Very good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht leicht und hält den Kopf schief.{/n} "Ihr nährt also auch einen Funken meiner Besessenheit und ich habe es geschafft, ihn zu einer Flamme zu entfachen. Gut. Sehr gut."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは首を傾げて柔らかく笑う。{/n}「ならば、お前も俺を支配する執着の火種を育み、俺はその炎を扇ぐことに成功したわけだ。いいな。とてもいい」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs softly, tilting his head.{/n} "So you also nurture a spark of the obsession that rules me, and I managed to fan it into a blaze. Good. Very good."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは首を傾げて柔らかく笑う。{/n}「ならば、お前も俺を支配する執着の火種を育み、俺はその炎を扇ぐことに成功したわけだ。いいな。とてもいい」

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs softly, tilting his head.{/n} "So you also nurture a spark of the obsession that rules me, and I managed to fan it into a blaze. Good. Very good."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, hafif bir kahkaha atıp başını eğiyor.{/n} "Demek bana hükmeden o saplantının bir kıvılcımını taşıyorsun, ben de onu harlatarak aleve dönüştürmeyi başardım. Güzel, çok güzel..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs softly, tilting his head.{/n} "So you also nurture a spark of the obsession that rules me, and I managed to fan it into a blaze. Good. Very good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, hafif bir kahkaha atarak başını eğiyor.{/n} "Yani sen de bana hükmeden o saplantının bir kıvılcımını taşıyorsun ve ben de onu harlatarak aleve dönüştürmeyi başardım. Güzel, çok güzel..."
